SELECT r.movieno, t.theaternm, r.viewday, r.roomno, r.tmember, rv.review, rv.star, mu.moviepostimg, mu.movienm FROM reservetb r LEFT OUTER JOIN reviewtb rv ON r.movieno = rv.movieno AND r.uuid = rv.uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT movieno, moviepostimg, movienm FROM movietb2 UNION SELECT movieno, moviepostimg, movienm FROM boxofficetb ) mu ON r.movieno = mu.movieno LEFT OUTER JOIN theatertb t ON r.areano = t.areano AND r.theaterno = t.theaterno
WHERE r.viewday < NOW()
AND r.uuid = #{uuid} ORDER BY r.viewday DESC
SELECT count(*) FROM reservetb r WHERE r.viewday < NOW() AND r.uuid = #{uuid}

SELECT li.movieno, m.moviepostimg, m.movienm, MIN(m.releaseday) AS releaseday, MAX(m.endday) AS endday, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM liketb WHERE movieno = li.movieno ) AS scrapRate FROM liketb li LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT movieno, moviepostimg, movienm, releaseday, endday FROM movietb2 UNION SELECT movieno, moviepostimg, movienm, releaseday, NULL AS endday FROM boxofficetb ) m ON li.movieno = m.movieno WHERE li.uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY li.movieno, m.moviepostimg, m.movienm ORDER BY releaseday DESC

SELECT r.movieno, MAX(r.viewday) AS viewday, rv.review, rv.star, m.movienm FROM reviewtb rv LEFT OUTER JOIN reservetb r ON r.movieno = rv.movieno AND r.uuid = rv.uuid LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT movieno, movienm FROM movietb2 UNION SELECT movieno, movienm FROM boxofficetb ) m ON rv.movieno = m.movieno
WHERE r.viewday < NOW()
AND r.uuid = #{uuid} GROUP BY r.movieno, rv.review, rv.star, m.movienm ORDER BY MAX(r.viewday) DESC
